snippet.title: And All Would Cry Beware Trailer
snippet.description:
Tales of the Renegade Sector Presents...

And All Would Cry Beware is a fast-paced 90s-style shooter with a Metroidvania Structure.  Step through a portal to a mysterious world.

Coming June...
Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/1071510/And_All_Would_Cry_Beware/
